p: Cells viability following treatment with extracts was measured using MTT assay [ 32]. The test uses the ability of active enzymes in functioning cells to reducing the tetrazolium dye MTT 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide to its insoluble formazan that was measured spectrophotometrically at 570 nm.
